sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" export default function MainInfo(){ let{name} = useParams() const [data, setData] = useState() useEffect(() => { axios.get(`https://api.coincap.io/v2/assets/${name}`).then((resp)=> { setData(resp.data.data) console.log(data.maxSupply) }) }, [name]) return(
← Back

X

{data?.symbol}

Abbreviation: {data?.symbol}

Name: {data?.name}

Supply: {parseFloat(data?.supply).toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')}

{data?.maxSupply !== null ?

Max Supply: {parseFloat(data?.maxSupply).toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')}

:

Max Supply: Infinty

}

Market Cap: {data?.marketCapUsd}

Volume 24hr: {data?.volumeUsd24Hr}

Price: {data?.priceUsd}

Change Percent: {data?.changePercent24Hr}

Volume-Weighted Average: {data?.vwap24Hr}

) }
